title: AED Game Character Voice - Dwarf King
description: Prepare for a grand adventure led by The Dwarf King, a brave, bawdy, and noble ruler who brings a touch of comedy and valor to your next character
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character - Dwarf King voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences


The voice profile of the Dwarf King is baritone, gritty and boisterous with a heavy Scottish accent sure to bring an element of comedy to your character! He is perfect for heroes, bards or more comedic oriented, in-game, non-player characters or bawdy, larger than life companions. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.


Features:

-Vocal Profile: Baritone, Scottish Accent, Male Voice

- Perfect for NPC's in game film based trailers.

- Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

55.5 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 303


Number of Audio Cues: 303


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
